topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a6928c6368721bae004601#post_55a6928c6368721bae004601
Steam came out in 2003.
List of Valve games that came after that (this might be incomplete, this is just all the stuff off the top of my head):
-Half-Life 2 (2004)
-Half-Life 2: Episode 1 (2006)
-Half-Life 2: Episode 2 (2007)
-Team Fortress 2 (2007)
-Portal (2007)
-Left 4 Dead (2008)
-Left 4 Dead 2 (2009)
-Portal 2 (2011)
-Dota 2 (2013)
